website_summaries.verdict: This simple and no-nonsense option from Amazon offers users a quality, sturdy product.
pros: Extremely lightweight at 24 pounds for customers needing an easily transportable bench
cons: A few owners had issues with the product's haphazard packaging

customer_reviews.title: the bench is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The hardware supplied for the feet is a little short. The bolts came with lock nuts, but needed another 1/2” in order for the lock but to work properly. Aside from the above, the bench is great for the price. Exactly as you’d expect from a flat bench. Works great. Please note: this did not come with the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Saldana

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and heavy duty for the price
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and heavy duty for the price. i was happily surprised to be honest. its not some cheap lightweight POS and im pretty sure it can handle well above and beyond the stated max weight of 385... im 6'1 and 220ish and have benched more than my weight using this bench with no issues. no wobbles,very sturdy, no frills, bench
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing exciting, but it's a solid and satisfactory bench. It's easy to put together, I can stand on the middle of it without worrying about it snapping (I'm 255lbs currently). The padding is firm but reasonably comfortable as a chair to sit on when I'm done working out. It does what I need it to do, so there are no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Graunke

customer_reviews.title: Solid enough for a great workout
customer_reviews.text: Item arrives well packaged and in two days. Put this together in about 8.5 - 10 minutes. Not one complication. Easy to follow instructions. Sturdy well built bench. Small enough to fit well in my studio apartment and not get in the way. Liteweight and easy to move. Solid enough for a great workout at home. Great product. Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: The Victor

customer_reviews.title: A great bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bench about a month and haven’t had any problems with it. It’s sturdy and serves it’s purpose well. The assembly was easy and took maybe 10 minutes. All my hardware was accounted for and didn’t pose a problem.
customer_reviews.author: J.Julia

customer_reviews.title: it’s a beautiful bench and very functional thank you
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble I tried it out it works beautifully, my only complaint is why are you sending me used items when I pay full price for new. The bench itself was covered in dirt rust and I had to clean it, aside from that it’s a beautiful bench. Also the tools are really inadequate the Phillips screwdriver provided not big enough to give any kind of leverage to even turn the screw. But aside from those Nonessentials, it’s a beautiful bench and very functional thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mora

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful steel, Terrible particle board bench
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was such that the center of the bench is unsupported in transit, and as such the flimsy backing was broken on arrival. Once the bence would be constructed, that flimsy backing would be more than enough as it would be supported by heavy steel with good welds. Unfortunately, the combination of poor packaging design and extremely thin bench resulted in a lot of transit stress being exerted on the weakest part of the bench. The cost saved by poor packaging would be worth paying if only to avoid having to wonder if the product would arrive intact. could easily be a 5 star bench, but I won't know until I get it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Particle Board Bench
customer_reviews.text: The Bench would be good if it wasn't made of thin particle board. Just bought it on 2/27/19 and put it together. When attaching the flat bench to the metal support I heard the particle board cracking. The middle of the bench was ok but the ends are cracked. Already threw the box out otherwise I would have returned it. Last time I'm buying anything marked AmazonBasics.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus J.

customer_reviews.title: i like the quality of the material but the tools i ...
customer_reviews.text: i like the quality of the material but the tools i got to screw in the bolts is too small. i have to use a old t shirt to keep the bench even on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improper hardware makes it unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench because I wanted something simple and functional for a good price. While the metal legs and feet are sturdy, the bolts provided for the feet are totally wrong for this product and I think it would become unsafe over time. They don't even match the packing list. Really? How hard is this to get right. This was noted in many reviews so this is not a one-off situation. Even though the assembly is easy, the instructions are so small as to be unreadable without a magnifying lens. The bench padding is good but has that slimy feel of cheap Chinese plastic. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Long Beach Larry

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Come missing several bolts and screws to put it together safely. Can't even return or refund it because the box was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Huynh

customer_reviews.title: A decent deal, but there's a reason it's cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this product for all that long, so I can comment on how well it holds up to use, but so far it doesn't seem bad. The tools it ships with are definitely inadequate for putting it together, and once it is together, the feet never feel like they're going to stay put. That said, it will feel solid when you sit or lay on it, and the materials feel solid. Overall, a good deal, but I'll probably upgrade to something a little more expensive if we end up using this thing a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kelderman

customer_reviews.title: Amazon’s choice weight bench
customer_reviews.text: So we like this weight bench it was very easy to put together, it is sturdy heavy metal the only complaint I have is that the fabric is a little brittle If you set a weight or something on top of it the imprint stays there for a while and I think the padding could’ve been thicker or better quality but other than that it serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Best Life

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hardware but fine bench
customer_reviews.text: Ok bench, wrong hardware sent and a bit narrow but does the job. However, while assembling they included the wrong hardware. Rather than a hex headed bolt (as shown in the instructions), they included a philips headed bolt which is too short and the wrong kind of bolt for assembling metal rails. Of course the package included a totally useless hex wrench. Come on Amazon China - a little quality control please?
customer_reviews.author: Alex Drachnik

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Bench was delivered on time went to put it together but there was no hardware to put the bench together...nothing. Had to go to home depot to get nuts bolts and washers to put the bench together. Absolutely no hardware came with the bench at all. The Bench is nice it came in four pieces and it didn't take long at all to put together it together once I got the hardware. The fact that there was no hardware left me quite disappointed. Would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Bshep1

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, but otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: The bench is missing 5 of the 8 washers it is supposed to come with. The bag holding them and the screws was ripped... Just glad all the screws/nuts/bolts were all accounted for. Other than that, it's a great bench--simple and basic, exactly what I was looking for. Once I get some washers to make everything more secure, I'm positive I'm going to love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Raggie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mar-30 : Seems to be very sturdy. Over all quality looks really good. Nut and bolts are of good quality. The assembly instructions are at the last page(should be on the first few pages instead as I almost thought they were not there) you need a good screw driver and wrench(I didn’t even try the supplied alen screw driver and multi wrench). Assembly took 10 mins. Foam is not very soft and that is ok. I didn’t find and rough edges and the square tubes supporting the seat have plastic cups which are helpful even during assembly preventing and scratches to the floor. I haven’t used it yet and just tried testing it and it looks very sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Himi

customer_reviews.title: Hex nuts don't fit, impossible to secure bench
customer_reviews.text: The hex nuts the secure the bench to the two "feet" don't secure on the screws. Three of them will twist *almost* entirely on, the fourth nut/screw (not sure which is the problem) does not fit with each other, meaning I can barely get them attached at all. They are all impossible to tighten entirely, so the bench constantly wobbles - not safe at ALL for weightlifting. I need replacement nuts and screws.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Stitching started to unravel within a few months
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you probably should not expect too much. The bench isn't the most stable I have ever owned but it is serviceable. The biggest problem is that the stitching started to separate between the foam covering and the bench structure within a month or so. Which isn't great given how rarely I use the bench and the (embarrassingly) small weights that I use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: Only bought this since the fitness center is closed for another three weeks(or more). It's super easy to assemble and pretty sturdy. Really easy to move around and enough padding too, really good value that will help fill the gap while we wait for COVID-19 to settle down.
customer_reviews.author: shade tree mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy and just feels solid. I've sat on the edge to work my lower abs and even caught my 4 year old climbing all over it, and it stayed standing up. Perfect if you don't have a large budget. Have already told a few people about it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality x3
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Bench arrived in an opened package and was warped. Support system was not level. Included tools that were wrong size for the product. Whole box smelled like intense concentrated body odor. Yuk
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are on the last page! Some quality control issues, but for the price it works.
customer_reviews.text: Spent 5 minutes trying to find the instructions, couldn't find them in the book. Then I went online to these reviews and saw that someone mentioned they are on the last page. They should really be at the very front next to the page with the package contents... Gave 3/5 for assembly because of this, but actually with the instructions it would be 4/5. The bench is pretty solid for the price, but there are a few quality issues. Some of the hardware was rusted... and the upholstery sewing is not straight. Haven't used for a workout yet but if it fails or breaks I'll be sure to update this post.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Eh... its ok
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give a lower review but I think Amazon sent me a used or returned item. The box was damaged when I got it and one of the legs was bent. I was still able to assemble and it works. It also looked like someone had previously assembled it. I would have returned it but I needed a bench to work out that day so I kept it. It works and reasonably sturdy it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MRiley

customer_reviews.title: NO HARDWARE INCLUDED!
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate any of the review elements because none of the hardware was included with the bench itself. I'm waiting for the screws, bolts and tools to arrive from somewhere, sometime, somehow :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover49

customer_reviews.title: Workouts are all I have...
customer_reviews.text: This bench is all I have now, to workout and make myself stronger, so that one day soon I will rise up and defeat that usurper and his perfect toned chest. The bench was simple to assemble, it's light, sturdy, and the tool for which I will sculpt a new body, one Janet can be proud of and one Brent will soon learn is the engine of his demise.
customer_reviews.author: Good Ole JR

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: This bench is everything I needed for a low price. It was easy to assemble and is very durable. I weigh a bit over the stated weight limit and it holds me and any added weights very well. I would suggest putting down a mat to protect floors or rugs as the base looks like it could cause minor damage over time. If you are using it in a place where you care about your flooring, definitely use a mat when you use the bench. I'm using a yoga mat. Otherwise, no complaints whatsoever. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BookerWA83

customer_reviews.title: quarantine fitness at it's best
customer_reviews.text: All the gyms are closed so to avoid putting on the pounds i picked this up early on. I use this every day to do everything with: i use it for decline pushups, i bench / pec/ row, lunges and basically anything from stretching to core. it's worth the money. pre quarantine i would have said it was boring and needed more stuff, but for the price and limited space in my room it took over for what i had been doing at the gym on many other bits of equipment. it's not a full gym, you will want weights, but it has been good enough. i'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Badhammer

customer_reviews.title: Rated for only 385
customer_reviews.text: I always find it interesting when workout equipment is clearly designed by people who don't work out. This bench is only rated for 385 lbs total, which is absurd. I can't imagine many men who have home gyms aren't exceeding that by quite a bit. However, it is very sturdy and I wouldn't worry about catastrophic failure. Maybe the plastic feet or the padding will get deformed over time, but I don't think the legs are going to buckle on you. So, I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Hardware discrepancy
customer_reviews.text: Bench seems great (for the cost). Exactly what I expected. However, both the image on the amazon ad AND the instructions themselves (step 2) indicate that there are 8 large washers for the large bolts (to connect feet to legs). The hardware included only had 4 large washers. To boot, the inventory within the instructions (item list) only list that 4 large washers were included. Discrepancies in the hardware aren’t a game-changer but they sure are frustrating for someone with mild OCD and a longing for perfection. Ultimately, I look forward to taking a lot of breaks during my workouts and this is the perfect spot to cop a squat and watch Parks and Recreation in-between sets/sprints.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many of the negative reviewers here, my bench came well packaged with all hardware included. Assembly only took a few minutes, I would recommend using a #3 Philips screwdriver rather than the included tiny hex tool when tightening the leg bolts. Bench is sturdy and just the right size, a great value for around $50. This will be used for light dumbbell workouts, and is a great bench for any beginner. Simple, functional, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Timazon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid bench, good price
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great for at home workouts. I use it for tricep dips, various step up exercises and ab work. It was easy to set up, although I used my own tools, not the ones provided. It's lightweight so it's easy to move around, but sturdy enough to handle body weight and without feeling like it's going to collapse underneath you. Space conscious too. Definitely takes my workouts to the next level, as it's better than using a chair. For the price, it can't be beat. I don't have a gym membership, so I feel it's worth it to get some decent equipment for home.
customer_reviews.author: MM717

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: My gym closed for at least a month for COVID-19, and I like to keep fit. I decided to setup something in my garage. This work out bench is a good buy. - Sturdy construction - Easy to setup - Does not wobble - Nuts/bolts were the appropriate length You will need a socket wrench, and large phillips screwdriver to assemple this correctly. I included a picture of the bench, Powerblocks EXP dumbbells and rubber floor mats purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: chris u.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t assembled this bad boy yet but I have never been so excited to write a review. Lol! Seriously though. I am extremely impressed. Just the right height for step up, etc. and for the money you cannot beat it!! I have had a different workout bench for home use before and was very disappointed in the sturdiness of it. The only thing I would change is possibly the width of it. Just a little narrow. Still, I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Renee Kellie

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers stated, the bolts that affix the uprights to the legs are too short. I was able to use them by not using the washers, but because I couldn't use the washers, the leg holes deform a bit and they become loose every so often. Not a big deal, but be aware the design is suspect and the parts are not the best. Great value for the money, however. This would be good enough for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts!
customer_reviews.text: The box had several large areas of damage on it which was to be expected for a heavy item. However, the parts bag inside had a cut in the bag so the bolts and washers spilled out and are nowhere to be found! Great Quality Control! <- that was sarcasm. Luckily a bolt of each size made it so I can at least go to Home Depot and buy replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya F

customer_reviews.title: Great for bodybuilding
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend this cheap bench for all my bodybuilders out there. Used this bench with my top sets being 315 and had absolutely no problem with sturdiness. I’ve also thrown up 100+ lb dumbells on this bench no problem and even used this for seal rows with 225 on the bar. I weigh 223 so do the math. Only minor problem is that it’s a TAD narrow. I have a pretty big back but overall it’s definitely something that doesn’t bother me. Definitely a great bench for price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Teofilo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as listed, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as listed. Padding seems comfortable and sturdy. Gave it 4 stars because it seems as though the sweatshop child that made this in China either got hungry and ate 4 of the supplied large washers or he stole them to trade for food.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench, base bolts need attention
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, speedy delivery. Assembly was very easy and the instruction manual was very, very easy to understand. I looked at it once and finished. The tools and hardware don't seem to match the quality of the bench. The bench is awesome. The bolts for the base are terrible! It's a couple terrible sunk bolt. The head requires a phillips bit and the nut is a lock nut. But a phillips bolt head? Anyway, the bench is so nice and packed so we'll, I gave it all the stars for that. I will eventually change out the 4 base bolts to something better. For the price, it's an awesome bench!
customer_reviews.author: RK153

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really expect much from this bench. I did somewhat figure it wouldn't last very long, given the price. However, this guy is pretty solid! We've been using it for a few months now, and it doesn't even need tightening of the screws. It is very basic, so it doesn't adjust, if I wanted to only recline a little, but I'm okay with that. It doesn't take up much room in the gym, and that's exactly what we need in our tiny home gym.
customer_reviews.author: The Royal Murphys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive weight bench this Amazon Basic is really perfect. All parts are heavy metal, with a blemish free black satin finish, simple rubberized feet. The bench was also perfectly sewn, no defects. Simple, functional and well made. Very nice. I deducted a star for the included instructions. In my review you will see me searching several times for assembly instructions. I could not find them in the book. I gave up and started putting it together anyway. The instructions actually are in the book but on the very last page after the 7th translation in Chinese. If Amazon is listening, I would move the assembly instructions to the front of the booklet. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Schrift

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to Assemble Despite Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to assemble this are simple (everything fit on one page, and I didn't need to refer to it again), but the bolts don't like to fit into the nuts. I had no trouble with one side, but the other side took me 15 minutes to get the bolts to screw into the nuts. And forget trying to use the provided tools: I used my own socket wrench and large screwdriver, but even still had trouble. Otherwise, product is as advertised and should do what it's meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: A Much Needed Addition to Home Workouts
customer_reviews.text: With the gyms closed for the COVID-19 pandemic, this was much needed to augment the weights and workout equipment I have at home. Bench is very sturdy and well made. It is getting good use. All hardware was there and fit correctly. Use real wrenches and screwdriver for better assembly. The included multi-tool thing is only for folks that have zero tools.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but edges crack and crunch under body weight.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, has a good shape to keep it upright. But if you put like any pressure at all away from the center it cracks like the board under is breaking. And the metal underlayment of whatever board is inside this leaves about 2.5 or 3 inches on each side to snap off while your lifting. Luckily I'm not using it for anything heavy. Just 180lb body weight.
customer_reviews.author: Drupedydoo

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Effective Bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench is really straightforward and perfect for what I need! The reason I am giving it two stars is because my specific bench came in a box with a cut zip-tie in it, no instructions, and absolutely no washers or screws or bolts. I have no way to put this together until I get my own. This was clearly a returned product or the manufacturer did not include these materials somehow.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Decent bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bench has met my expectations. It is sturdy and comfortable. Assembly was easy. I wouldn't ask much more from a bench priced at $40.
customer_reviews.author: M.Clay

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Very solid.
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived quicker than expected. I had it together in approx ten minutes, even without any assembly instructions. Otherwise, it’s exactly what I need it for. It’s true, the tools stink, but I have tools and that made it assemble easily. Checked out other benches within this price category , and this is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: citcust

customer_reviews.title: Little bit too short for me
customer_reviews.text: I like this bench, But i can't really do chest press on it comfortably, Im 6'2 tall and i can barely fit myself on it when i try to do chest press, But it works great for other workout, My recommendation is that if you are a tall person then look some where else, Other wise you would like, For the quality of it and the sturdiness its worth the money if you are not that tall
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Okour

customer_reviews.title: very hard to find setup instruction. it's hidden.
customer_reviews.text: The multi-language user manual doesn't have the most important piece that a user can find easily. Without the manual, you can make mistakes and end up in a wrong direction.
customer_reviews.author: Berwyn_Man

customer_reviews.title: Came apart after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for near daily dumbbell workouts never exceeding 100 lbs total with my 200lb bodyweight. I never expected the bench to last for life at this price, but 3 months is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Usable with Modification
customer_reviews.text: This is the most unstable bench ever created and is an absolute liability to the user. The hex nuts it comes with have rubber rings inside them and the screws it ships with are far too long for the feet which causes a crazy amount of instability. I had to go to the hardware store and purchase new hex nuts for the feet to make it stable. Also, the tools that are included to build the bench are absolutely trash and don't really fit the screws and nuts. Hope this helped.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Blaskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sturdy, VERY EASY ASSEMBLY!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was very easy to assemble and came with all tools to assembly including those needed to tighten the screws and bolts. I specifically like how this and sturdy the base is as it seems to provide extra support. The only complaint I have with this bench is that it dents very easy on the material area and does not return to its original state. I would imagine the material used would wear very easily just based on my current assessment after using these a few times to train
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The seat and supports are good quality, with no manufacturing defects. However, half of the nuts and bolts needed to assemble the bench were missing. Would not recommend, would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: JCraig

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench, very easy to assemble and strong
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome. Of course it does not sit at an angle, it can only sit flat. But it is very sturdy: my big 60 lb labrador retriever climbs on it sometimes and there is no wobblines or anything. It is very sturdy and I can do a variety of exercises on it. Plus, it was one of the cheapest options online Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Graciousroz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay bench for the price. It would have got 4 stars but I decided to try to use the tools they included. If you look in the video, the Philip screwdriver end of this Allen wrench is so small, the bolt spins. Also, the threads of the bolt is so short that they barely reach the nut threads.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was little concerned with some of the other reviews. The bench is very sturdy. Make sure you put the Phillips head bolts in up from the bottom (don't put a washer on them)- and they will tighten into the holes - and they are long enough to add a washer and the nut on the top side
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Holloway

customer_reviews.title: not level
customer_reviews.text: the 2 small plates connecting the post to the feet where really bent and not flat from the bench i received, making the whole bench tilt quit a bit sideway and not level. You might be luckier and not have this problem but for me, it was a hassle to receive a defective bench and have to return a larger item such as this. I would recommend paying more and getting a better bench.
customer_reviews.author: kpm

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Bench, But missing Washers
customer_reviews.text: Contents show 8 washers total, 4 of one size, and 4 of the other. In the instructions however it calls for 12 washers. That is off kilter. Otherwise seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: BigBen&Parliament

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench to workout at home
customer_reviews.text: I was scared that the bench would not work well for me as I am 6'4" tall. However, I found the bench to be the perfect size. I have no issues doing exercises while laying down on it. The quality of the bench is great, very sturdy. The assembly was very easy. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but, assembly directions were in the back of the guidebook so I didn't realize they were included. I chose this bench because the cost was reasonable and it could be delivered (free) to my house within about five days. I would have preferred a more expensive incline bench, but, that would have taken several weeks to arrive. I have been using it with light dumbbells. There are only eight bolts which hold the bench together, so, one should be careful if bench pressing (or incline flys) very heavy weights. I am glad I have this bench. I will probably not need it after the gym reopens.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Delivered As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy workout bench that I feel safe working out on. It did require assembly and didn't include instructions, but was easy enough to figure out. The padding isn't very thick but it's sufficient for laying, seated, and standing exercises in my opinion. I have only owned it for a short time at this point, but would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's just a bench, doesn't pretend to be anything more, exactly what I needed. I use it to do one of my favorite exercises--dumbbell/barbell pullovers. (Lie on back with weights in hand, lower weights in arc to behind your head, raise weights up over head to chest or gut, repeat.) It's very easy to assemble, it's level, and it's very sturdy. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGrady

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for accessory work for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for Price. Good for accessory work but not for moderate to heavy bench pressing (345lb total limit). Also as others have stated, the mounting bolts for the legs are a tight fit length wise. I think they are just long enough but I understand why people think they are too short.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Nimmo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, it only came with about 4 separate parts that you have to screw together. Everything you need is provided. I've been using it every other day for about a month now and have had no issues with it. Overall it seems pretty sturdy and I would recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle vG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bench for our use, very stable. Also, a bit lower to ground than some, which is what I was looking for. Does not get heavy usage (people or weight), but is sturdy and well made. Went together fine, and no obvious defects.
customer_reviews.author: Lenski99

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and solid
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. It came with it's own tools but I did find it necessary to use my own screwdriver and ratchet in order to tighten all of the bolts to my satisfaction. The bench is very light and easy to move out of the way. Works well for strength training with dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, very cheap bench.
customer_reviews.text: The width of the bench is just right for me (I'm 6'1" with average width shoulders), but the length is ever so slightly too short, in my opinion. I could use a few more inches to comfortably do the laying overhead dumbbell tricep lift, but that's a minor gripe. The legs are sturdy and assembly is super easy. Very good bang for your buck. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Rockin it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because of all the reviews about missing hardware. Luckily mine was all there, however the bag the hardware was in was ripped open so the pieces were scattered all over the inside of the box. Bench is very very sturdy after assembly but because of the shoddy way it was shipped, it loses a star. But for $40 it’s a solid buy all day every day until you hit it big, gangsta..
customer_reviews.author: Best Reviewer of All Time

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it six stars, I would.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is an insanely good value. It’s almost as nice as a commercial quality bench you’d find in a gym. It’s also very sturdy, heavy, and comfortable. I have no idea how Amazon makes any money on these. Hurry up and buy one before the quality or price changes!
customer_reviews.author: E. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great value at 50, maybe even 80
customer_reviews.text: It was fifty bucks when I bought it. And for that money, it adds a lot of value. Since I’m not paying gym membership, this is well within my budget and a worthwhile investment. This plus a few pairs of dumbbells greatly expand the workouts I can do at home.
customer_reviews.author: The Count of Monte Cristo

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome for the price! Considering every single fitness equipment store is completely sold out of every thing, I found this in stock and available by Prime and I cannot be happier! My first workout, I used it as a plyo box and did step-ups. It is sturdy and the quality is great! Once my barbell and weights are delivered, I will test it out as a true bench but until then, it is works great for dips, abs and everything in between!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Great price. A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The most important aspect of the bench I was looking for I found in this bench, stability. This bench doesn't wobble to one side or the other. It is very comfortable to sit on and lay flat on when bench pressing or doing seated shoulder pressing. For the price, shipping speed, compactness, and total weight and size of the bench it was a perfect buy! I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JustADude

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hardware came with the bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench came with the wrong hardware and the instructions list 4 washers but you actually need 8 washers. Plus, the washers that did come with the kit are the wrong size. The bolts were also the wrong type. Had to make a special trip to the hardware store to pick up the proper hardware, which I was trying to avoid due to the pandemic. Otherwise, it is a good bench set.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bench for the price point ($47.99). Some of there reviewers had issues about missing parts. I must say the the plastic bag containing the nuts and bolts was open but the all the parts were contained in the box. I was lucky the box didn't have a hole it from shipping and handling. The bench was easy to assemble and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Have your own thick screw driver rather than the one it comes with.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’1 and this is just long enough for me to lay on. Took about 10 minutes to put together. Seems sturdy enough. I was missing one washer but no big deal. Feel like it shouldn’t be $40, maybe $30.. but i am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley G

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Solid little weight bench. The instructions say 380 pound limit. I bench pressed yesterday then did weighted step ups. Felt solid but I didn’t exceed the weight limit. Felt good to my back when benching. Not too wide or too soft. Very easy to assemble. It comes with some tools, but I used my socket set. Went together in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good weight bench
customer_reviews.text: Good weight bench. Pretty tall though. I am a 5’8” woman with long legs and this is almost too tall for me to do step ups or bench hop overs. The padding is nice, not too thin and feels comfortable. It feels sturdy and was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Falkner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't bench too often, and when I do its not crazy amounts of weight. Also, I'm only 5'5 so it fits me just fine. If you are on the taller side (5'10+) I would probably go with something different. The foam inside holds up pretty well, my fiancé will do step up every now and then on it, and it still has its original shape.
customer_reviews.author: Constantly Varied Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Terrible packaging, hardware was just thrown in or fell out of whatever they were in. Missing washers, luckily I had some extras laying around. Nuts used to secure legs to bench have the locking plastic but the boots aren’t long enough to touch it making it pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Lockmor

customer_reviews.title: Not a high quality bench
customer_reviews.text: Got the bench, it had a bent plate on the down leg. It wasnt terrible, so I assembled. The bench had a bad diagonal wobble. I dont think the bend had anything to do with the wobble, just seems like it wasn't designed all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Edelen

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his home gym. It’s pretty basic. Super easy to put together. It’s literally just a bench. So if your looking for something very basic this is a perfect go to for the money. I personally like a incline bench better but my husband likes it
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Welbaum

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The padded bench broke day two with my 180lb weight gripping the edge. But the return is such a pain and I need something for the quarantine so I'll work around that. It was cheap so i guess I shouldn't expect any durability.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Its just a bench. It would be difficult to screw that up. But guess what! The factory in china forgot to put half of the washers in the hardware blister pack. They're not totally necessary and it works fine without, but when your printed book says to use 8x of a specific washer and the hardware package only has 4....
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Sanclementi

customer_reviews.title: No bolts to put the bench together.
customer_reviews.text: The bench seems great but I can't fully test it because I received 3 of one kind of bolts, 2 locking nuts, 1 washer. The box looked like hell when it arrived. It might be a good product but the packers need to be more careful and make sure the correct supplies and padding are added.
customer_reviews.author: Tripp Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my home workouts with dumbbells. The assembly was difficult due to the bolts included in the kit. I believe some of the hardware was not threaded true at the factory. I may upgrade with better hardware in the future. Overall, nice bench.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Butner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bench great for home workouts. Box was in tact upon delivery, delivery was prompt and arrived even promised. Padding is high quality and overall product is well worth the purchase. You get more then what you pay for -most definitely.
customer_reviews.author: ScorpWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for now...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as soon as I saw it in stock and ready to be shipped. Fairly priced, decent quality, and easy to assemble. Haven’t used it for workouts yet because I’m still waiting for my barbell and power rack to be delivered, but after building the bench it seems it’ll hold for the weight I am and the weight I’ll be lifting with (<250lbs all together). Wasn’t happy with the rusting on the inside of the legs and the chip on the outer part of the leg, hence the reason why I took off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, took me about 25 mins and that's because one of the holes was misaligned and I had to struggle to get the screw in. There are definitely better benches available, but if you're looking for something sturdy and simple that doesn't break the back definitely go for it. Good for a smaller home gym
customer_reviews.author: Charlitha Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Decent bench, terrible packing
customer_reviews.text: Bolts were strewn about the package due to how they were packed, a washer was missing and the bolts didn't match the pictures in the instructions. The feet were hard to install as the bolts were just barely long enough, even full tightened they don't even come to the rubber on the nut. Bench itself feels sturdy but a trip to the hardware store for better bolts is likely required
customer_reviews.author: J. Bunn

customer_reviews.title: great addition!!
customer_reviews.text: i work out at home and purchased this to add to my small home gym which consists of hand weights/dumb bells, resistance bands and a bosu ball. i was missing a few small pieces, but it seems as though i didn't really need them. assembly was easy. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ADINA F

customer_reviews.title: “Paint” shreds from bolt tightening - otherwise a nice cheap bench
customer_reviews.text: No assembly instructions included but only 8 total bolts and 8 washers. When tightening the first bolt it ripped the “paint” to shreds so be careful when tightening. That’s the only reason this gets 4/5 stars for me. Needed a bench that can also double as a piano bench for maximum space saving. Works for that purpose. Cheapest bench on the internet too so that’s good.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: No HARDWARE IN BOX
customer_reviews.text: We didn't get any hardware (Screws etc) to assemble, nor were any assembly instructions included!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Missing 4 washers, HORRIBLE misleading instructions(for what should be super simple build)
customer_reviews.text: 4 washer were missing, and one of the bolt screw in spots doesn't work, so it's only held on by 3 bolts instead of 4(hopefully it wont fall apart, but if it does, I know who I'm sending my lawyers for). My advice, get another similarly priced brand; Amazon basic might be slightly cheaper, but the quality is evidently WAY down(and probably Chinese).
customer_reviews.author: Organism

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: It would be perfect if it came with all the necessary materials to put it together. Mine came with 2 small washers 4 large washers all 8 bolts and only 2 nuts. The pieces were just thrown into the box loose.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Stable and sturdy press bench.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bench for the price. I am a 70 y/o female and it was so easy to put it together. Very well packed, all parts and instructions included. Fast shipping. Very stable and sturdy, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Coquito

customer_reviews.title: What't not to like???
customer_reviews.text: Wow. You just can;t beat this price. Especially for the quality. VERY comfortable to work out on. I have come to trust Amazon Basic over the years and there has not been a single item to disappointment me. This bench is no exception. Get it....now
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile bench!
customer_reviews.text: Lock down made a lot of ppl create a hone gym. This bench was cheap, very sturdy and was delivered quickly. No issues with it, feels sturdy when doing any lifts and even as a make shift box jump platform. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddicted

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly for seats so it is the perfect height for me. I’m short so this works. Great pad as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool bench!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. All I needed was something durable to use at home when I don't feel like or have time for the gym. So I just slide it to the middle if my living room floor and work out. When I am done I push it back against the wall and its not heavy at all but very sturdy, and does not take up a whole lot of space. Easy to put together took me all of 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Mine didn't come with instructions but I'm a single mom who has been putting items together for years so this was nothing. 4 parts and only 8 screws & 8 washers! Love it! It's sturdy but the top seems a little flimsy in my opinion but for $50 bucks I'm not complaining! This will definitely get put to use with all this time on my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Tam G

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Flat Weight Workout Exercise Bench - 41 x 20 x 11 Inches, Black
feature_bullets: Flat weight bench enhances any home gym; ideal for both beginning and advanced levels
Accommodates a wide range of fitness routines for a full-body workout in a small amount of space
Made of rugged high-quality materials, including a durable steel tube frame and a smooth PVC top surface
Assembles quickly and easily; weighs 24 pounds; upside-down T-shaped legs/feet for reliable stability
Measures 41 x 11 (bench surface width) / 19.7 (overall width) x 17.9 inches (LxWxH); backed by an AmazonBasics one-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
